metadata.title: CVE-2015-5731 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wp-admin/post.php inWordPress before 4.2.4 allows remote attackers to hijack the authenticationof administrators for requests that lock a post, and consequently cause adenial of service (editing blockage), via a get-post-lock action.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
